column2: title=Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 18 June 2013

column1: '''''Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 18 June 2013''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's. The catalogue includes the following sale of letters by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:<ref name=HS>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology
column10: articlename=TWO AUTOGRAPH LETTERS SIGNED ('J.R.R. TOLKIEN') TO DORIS SYKES (Sale 8952, Lot 30)

column1: *Lot 30 (p. 12): [[Letter to Doris Elizabeth Sykes (28 January 1956)]] and [[Letter to Doris Elizabeth Sykes (July 1956)]]
